00235 O_spectral::O_spectral(int pitchin, list<float> & coeffin, int statenbin, int bufferefin, int durationin, int phrasein, int sectionin) : O_label(statenbin, bufferefin, durationin, phrasein, sectionin)

00281 
00283 float* O_spectral::get_coeffs(float* dataout)
00284 {
00285         int i = 0;
00286         list<float>::iterator fit;
00287         if (dataout == NULL && coeffs.size()!=0)
00288                 dataout = (float*)malloc(coeffs.size()*sizeof(float));
00289         for (fit = coeffs.begin(); fit != coeffs.end(); fit++)
00290                 dataout[i++]=*fit;
00292         return dataout;
00293 }

00298         {

00300                 coeffs = coeffin;
00301         }

00308 
00309 // Operator Overload
00310 bool O_spectral::operator== (const O_spectral & other) const
00311 {
00314         bool out = true;
00315         if (coeffs.size()!=other.coeffs.size())
00316                 return false;
00317         list<float>::const_iterator it = ++coeffs.begin();
00318         list<float>::const_iterator otherit = ++other.coeffs.begin();
00319         while (out == true && it!=coeffs.end())
00320         {
00321                 out = (*it == *otherit);
00322                 it++;
00323                 otherit++;
00324         }
00325         return out;
00326 }
00327 
00328 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, const O_spectral & spectralin)
00329 {
00330         out<<spectralin.pitch<<" : ";
00331         list<float>::const_iterator it;
00332         for (it = spectralin.coeffs.begin(); it!= spectralin.coeffs.end(); it++)
00333                 out<<(*it)<<" ";
00334         out<<" : "<<spectralin.phrase<<" "<<spectralin.bufferef<<endl;
00335         return(out);
00336 }

00499 // Set & Get
00500 
00501 list<O_MIDI_note> O_MIDI_poly::get_notes()
00502 {
00503         return notes;
00504 }
00505 
00506 int* O_MIDI_poly::get_notes(int* notesout)
00507 {
00508         int i;
00509         i = notes.size();
00510         if (notesout == NULL)
00511                 notesout = (int*)malloc(i*4*sizeof(int));
00512         i = 0;
00513         list<O_MIDI_note>::iterator noteit;
00514         for (noteit = notes.begin(); noteit!= notes.end(); noteit++)
00515         {
00516                 notesout[i] = noteit->pitch;
00517                 notesout[i+1] = noteit->velocity;
00518                 notesout[i+2] = noteit->channel;
00519                 notesout[i+3] = noteit->offset;
00520                 i+=4;
00521         }
00522         return notesout;
00523 }
00524 
00525 void O_MIDI_poly::set_notes(list<O_MIDI_note> notesin)
00526 {
00527         notes = notesin;
00528 }
00529 
00530 void O_MIDI_poly::set_notes(O_MIDI_note* note1,...)
00531 {
00532         va_list notelist;
00533         va_start(notelist,note1);
00534         O_MIDI_note* noteptr = note1;
00535         while (noteptr!= NULL)
00536         {
00537                 notes.push_back(*noteptr);
00538                 noteptr = va_arg(notelist,O_MIDI_note*);
00539         }
00540         va_end(notelist);
00541         notes.sort();
00542 }
00543 
00544 list<int> O_MIDI_poly::get_pitches() const
00545 {
00546         list<int> pitches;
00547         list<O_MIDI_note>::const_iterator noteit;
00548         for (noteit = notes.begin(); noteit!= notes.end(); noteit++)
00549                 pitches.push_back(noteit->pitch);
00550         pitches.unique();
00551         return pitches;
00552 }

00575 
00576 bool O_MIDI_poly::operator== (const O_MIDI_poly & other) const
00577 {
00578         //returns The (lazy) pairwise comparison of the pitches
00579         /*list<int> pitches = get_pitches();
00580         list<int> other_pitches = other.get_pitches();
00581         int nbpitches = pitches.size();
00582         if (other_pitches.size()!=nbpitches)
00583                 return false;
00584         pitches.merge(other_pitches);
00585         pitches.unique();
00586         return(pitches.size()== nbpitches);*/
00587         
00588         extern int modulo;
00589         
00590         // comparaison modulo 12
00591         
00592         if (modulo)
00593         {
00594                 return (fmod(vpitch,12.)==fmod(other.get_vpitch(),12.));
00595         }
00596         else
00597         {
00598         // Comparaison exacte
00599         return(vpitch == other.get_vpitch());
00600         }
00601         
00602 }

00604 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, const O_MIDI_poly & framein)
00605 {
00606         list<O_MIDI_note>::const_iterator noteit;
00607         for (noteit = framein.notes.begin(); noteit!= framein.notes.end(); noteit++)
00608                 out<<" "<<(*noteit)<<endl;
00609         out<<framein.vpitch<<" "<<framein.mvelocity<<" "<<framein.phrase<<" "<<framein.bufferef<<endl;
